body_html: @meteorcloudy Is there a corresponding issue against https://github.com/grpc/grpc for adding this? We'd like to keep the diff between our forked/fixed build file and the standard one small, so that we can switch back to using it instead.
body_text: @meteorcloudy Is there a corresponding issue against https://github.com/grpc/grpc for adding this? We'd like to keep the diff between our forked/fixed build file and the standard one small, so that we can switch back to using it instead.
